roleset.name: interfere with something

example.name: impinge
example.text: [When]-9 freedoms, for instance, impinge upon others ' rights to life and health [*T*]-9, there ought * to be self-imposed limits and a sense of self-restraint.
example.arg: upon others ' rights to life and health

roleset.note: IMPINGE-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from impinge.01-v)
